name: Scuba
description: '''Paul Rose''' (born 30 June 1979), usually known as '''Scuba''' (also known by his '''SCB''' alias), is a British electronic musician and podcaster, now based in Berlin. Described as 'one of dance music's most inventive producers', he has released four albums, numerous singles and EPs, and a handful of compilation and mix albums. His style has been described as dubstep with a later 'shift toward a brighter and more eclectic approach to production'. In 2013, he won an award for Best Live Act from ''[[DJ Mag]]''.
